# Как запускать шайни?

```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  sliderInput("user_bins",
              NULL,
              min = 1,
              max = 50,
              value = 30),
  plotOutput("our_plot")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$our_plot <- renderPlot({
    diamonds %>% 
      ggplot(aes(price))+
      geom_histogram(bins = input$user_bins)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```

Еще бывает:

* `shiny::runGitHub()`
* `shiny::runGist()`
* `shiny::runUrl()`

```{r, eval = FALSE}
runGitHub("agricolamz/norm_chisq_app")
```

## Виды вопросов

# Server

```{r, eval = FALSE}
server <- function(input, output) {
  ...
}
```

## Текст

```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  textInput(inputId = "var",
            label = NULL,
            value = "%>%"),
  textOutput("our_text")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$our_text <- renderText({
    paste(input$var, "у тебя в штанах!")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```

## Таблица

```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  selectInput(inputId = "var", 
              label = "Выберите столбец:", 
              choices = colnames(mtcars)),
  tableOutput("our_table")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$our_table <- renderTable({
    mtcars[,input$var]
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```

## График
```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  selectInput(inputId = "var", 
              label = "Выберите столбец:", 
              choices = colnames(mtcars)),
  plotOutput("our_plot")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$our_plot <- renderPlot({
    library(dplyr)
    library(ggplot2)
    mtcars %>% 
      ggplot(aes(mpg, disp))+
      geom_point()+
      aes_string(color = input$var)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
